entree.name: Corn fritter stack
entree.description: Sweetcorn fritters served with coriander, cherry tomato relish & soft poached egg

entree.name: Garlic lemon scallops
entree.description: Pan seared scallops served with garlic and lemon butter sauce

entree.name: Maple baked kumara wedges
entree.description: Oven-baked kumara wedges that are sticky, sweet, salty, crunchy and soft all at the same time. Served with an aioli dipping sauce

main.name: Kiwi lamb cutlets
main.description: A delicious crunch to these cutlets, using oregano and paprika. Drizzled with a tart lemon vinaigrette and served with a side of baby potatoes and leafy greens.

main.name: Scotch fillet
main.description: Angus scotch fillet steak served with sauce and garden vegetables.

main.name: Fish & chips
main.description: Beer battered fresh NZ snapper served with fries and a side of kiwi coleslaw

dessert.name: Mini pavlova
dessert.description: Baked meringue with whipped cream and sliced fresh fruit

dessert.name: Hokey pokey ice cream
dessert.description: Hokey pokey ice cream with hokey pokey toffee and hot toffee sauce
